backend/main.mo: Defines user, trip, diamond, payout types with sorting utilities and manages state for users, trips, diamonds, earnings, and payouts with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related source files, components, and test IDs for diamond assessment, verification, buyer connections, and UI branding updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files including authentication, dashboard, trips, payouts, diamonds, and layout components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes with OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication flow, profile setup, and routing into the dashboard within the app layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthWelcome: Unauthenticated landing page with branding, diamond imagery, feature descriptions, and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Reusable login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/buyers/BuyersPan: Displays a list of buyer platforms fetched from the API with links and guidance for contacting buyers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Main dashboard that switches between diamonds, buyers, profile, and credits views based on user selection.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Driver: Shows open trips and the driver’s accepted trips in two sections.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Passen: Shows a trip request form and the passenger’s trips panel.
frontend/src/components/diamonds/Diamond: Lets users upload, preview, and remove a locally stored diamond photo.
Displays a diamond record with photo, details, and a button to copy a generated summary.
Form for creating a new diamond record including notes, optional details, and an optional photo.
Lists the user’s diamond records and provides a form to add new ones.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with logo, user info, and navigation for diamonds, buyers, profile, and credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/payouts/DriverEa: Displays driver earnings, available balance, and recent completed trip payouts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/payouts/DriverPa: Wraps the earnings card, payout request form, and payout history into a single driver payouts dashboard.
frontend/src/components/payouts/PayoutHi: Shows a driver's payout request history with status badges, dates, and amounts, including loading handling.
frontend/src/components/payouts/PayoutRe: Provides a form for submitting payout requests with balance validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileF: Lets users view or edit their profile info with mutation-driven updates and role-based UI elements.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleSele: Guides new users through selecting a role and entering basic profile details before registration.
frontend/src/components/trips/MyTripsPan: Displays passenger or driver trips with status, fare, locations, actions, and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/components/trips/OpenTripsL: Displays a list of open trips with pickup/dropoff details and allows drivers to accept a trip via mutation.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripReques: Form for passengers to create a new trip request by entering pickup, dropoff, and fare, submitting via createTripRequest.
frontend/src/components/trips/TripStatus: Renders cancel or complete trip actions based on user role and trip status using cancel and complete mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, identity loading, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles and trip operations, wrapping backend actor calls with caching and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global color variables, dark mode variants, and utility component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CreditsPage.tsx: Renders a styled credits page highlighting the developer and app mission with UI card components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the diamond‑focused app.
